food.title: Fauget Tuna (8 pcs)
food.description:
White tuna sashimi garnished
with fresh mango and grilled garlic.

food.title: Atlantis (8 pcs)
food.description:
Crabstick, asparagus, fried carrot, tempura,
tobiko andavocado rolled in a soya bean leaf,
topped with smoked-salmon.

food.title: Besame Mucho (8 pcs)
food.description:
Spicy tuna, crispy tempura, cooked shrimps
and avocado rolled in a soya bean leaf.

food.title: Salmon Sensation (8 pcs)
food.description: Spicy salmon, avocado, lettuce, shiso leaf, tobiko.

food.title: Heaven* (6 pcs)
food.description:
6 Pieces of red tuna sashimi on grilled-rice
medallion, topped with shiso leaves rolled with smoked-salmon.

food.title: Rainbow Sashimi (9 pcs)
food.description: Slices of tuna, salmon and white snapper sashimi with a soy-based sauce.

food.title: Spicy Sunshine (4 pcs)
food.description: A tasty seasoned tartar of fresh scallops and crab, served on 4 sweet potato chips.

food.title: Mango Tango* (8 pcs)
food.description: Tempura shrimp, raw scallop, tobiko and mango strips rolled in soya bean leaf.

food.title: Rose Maki (8 pcs)
food.description:
A soya bean leaf wrapped roll with tuna, tempura
shrimp, avocado, tobiko and fresh asparagus.

food.title: New York*
food.description: Srimp tempura, orange, massago, spicy mayo.

food.title: Rom√©o et Juliette* (6 pcs)
food.description:
A slightly tempura breaded roll with tempura
shrimps, strawberries, pineapple and blueberries.

food.title: Dragon Ears (4 pcs)
food.description: Tartare of tuna, crab and shrimp with avocado served on wonton chips

food.title: Summer Roll (6 pcs)
food.description: Spicy crab, spicy tuna, avocado, tobiko, wrapped with cucumber.

food.title: Venus* (8 pcs)
food.description:
A light tempura roll with spicy salmon, avocado,
tobiko, shiso leaf, fried onion and carrots.

food.title: Phoenix* (8 pcs)
food.description:
Crabsticks, avocado, mango and fried onions rolled
in soya paper topped off with tuna sashimi.

food.title: French Kiss (4 pcs)
food.description:
A tastily seasoned tartar of fresh shrimps, salmon
and tuna, served on 4 shrimps chips with tobiko.
